MAN.TITLE: pf
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: The F (or Fisher Snedecor) cumulative distribution function

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : degrees of freedom (x,df1,df2 can be scalar or matrix with common size)
: for each element of x, F=Prob((X/df1)/(Y/df2) < x) where X and Y are independent Chi-square random variables with one degree of freedom

DESCRIPTION.P: The F (or Fisher-Snedecor) cumulative distribution function
